post_meta.add_title: Disveloppate per un equipa de polyglottas

members.description: Richard Delamore, known by his online pseudonym Evildea, is an Australian Esperanto YouTube-personality and leading figure in the Esperanto film industry. Prior to co-founding Amikumu, Richard founded Esperanto-TV and served on the Board of Directors for the Australian Esperanto Association (AEA), the Language Festival Association (LFA) and the Esperanto Federation of New South Wales (EFNSW). Additionally, he’s served six years in the Australian army as a signals operator and worked for numerous international businesses as a systems administrator.
members.quote: Amikumu is an essential part of every language learner’s toolkit.

members.description: Chuck Smith is the co-organizer of the Polyglot Gathering, contributor of Duolingo’s Esperanto course and founder of the Esperanto Wikipedia, among other Esperanto and polyglot projects. He has been developing iOS apps since Apple’s App Store launched in 2008. He had the idea for a GPS device to find fellow Esperanto speakers while traveling through Brazil in 2002, but needed to wait 15 years for technology to catch up, so he could pursue this dream. Now he looks forward to meeting the challenges ahead to help people everywhere connect to make the world a better place.
members.languages: English, Esperanto, German, Spanish, French, Dutch, Polish, ASL
members.quote: I love seeing all the great ways people are meeting up to speak different languages with Amikumu all over the world!

members.description:
Tanja is a stay at home geek who has extensive experience in customer support (both front and back office) for several ISPs. In her free time she codes, creates various items with yarn and plays videogames (or does the New York Times crossword puzzle).

After re-entering the world of Esperanto, she voluntarily helped rewrite the code for the current version of Amikumu, as well as being responsible for the layout.
members.quote: Amikumu makes it so easy to meet new people who share my interests, no matter where I am. I love working on an app that I use myself and help users get the best experience out of it!

members.description: Judith Meyer is a computational linguist spending most of her time developing web applications that deal with languages, such as her project LearnYu. She is also a polyglot, co-organizer of the Polyglot Gathering and author of many language books and language courses. She learned Esperanto when she was 14 years old so as to use it as a springboard to learning many other languages.
members.languages: German, English, Esperanto, Latin, French, Italian, Modern Greek, Mandarin, Dutch, Spanish, Indonesian, Hebrew, Swahili
members.quote: Amikumu is a boon for polyglots like me – I'm always surprised by who speaks Greek, Hebrew or Indonesian around me.

members.description: Jesse Alter is a Linux system administrator with degrees in Computer Science and Social Work. Over the years, Jesse has maintained servers for multiple websites and services while working as a pediatric social worker. He later changed his career to follow his lifelong interest in developing and maintaining computer systems. Apart from Amikumu, Jesse’s interests include retrocomputing, information privacy, and data analysis.
members.quote: Amikumu gives me the ability to instantly find language partners for any language I know or am interested in, wherever I am. To me, that’s a superpower.

members.description: Elena Khusanova is an accomplished graphic designer with a diploma in the theory of architecture. After graduation, she learned Esperanto and has since worked for multiple organizations and events. Highlights include her voluntary service for E@I in Slovakia and the 101st World Esperanto Congress among other projects. Recently she completed a project of her own: cards for the game “Werewolves”.
members.languages: English, Russian, Esperanto, Slovak, Swedish, Toki Pona
members.quote: The beauty of Amikumu is that it doesn’t only help me find new language partners, but also make new friends offline.

section.#text: In essentia, le ambassadores es personas qui adjuta a promover Amikumu in lor communitates local. Illes es nostre representantes in terra! Nostre plus grande fans e appoiatores.
Isto depende de como illes pote ingagiar se. Nos ha listate alcun manieras in que nostre ambassadores collabora con nos a promover Amikumu in tote le mundo.
section.ul:
#. Illes publica postas de blog e videos YouTube! Per exemplo, reguarda `Amikumu: The App Yiddish Speakers have been Waiting for! <https://youtu.be/6g3QtBtBB_U>`_ (Moshe Sherizen) e `Auslan: What is Amikumu? <https://youtu.be/57W73If51NE>`_ (Kiah Morante) inter alteres. Nos ha un tote pagina dedicate al `communicationes de pressa <http://amikumu.com/press/>`_.
 	#. Invio de ligamines in gruppos Facebook e sur profilos personal. Mesmo un simple demonstration de appoio public pote facer un grande differentia!
 	#. Distribution de pamphletos e discussion de Amikumu in reuniones linguistic local. Isto es etiam un optime maniera de establir e facer crescer un communitate local.
 	#. `Traduction del app <https://traduk.amikumu.com/engage/amikumu/ia>`_ e del sito web in linguas local. Nostre objectivo: devenir le app le plus traducite in le mundo. Nos require tote le adjuta possibile pro attinger isto.
 	#. Illes es nostre guidas de importantia vital. Nos comprende que cata lingua e cultura es differente. Nos ha necessitate de tu consilios pro saper como ager melio in tu communitate.

subsection.#text:
Amikumu es un que te adjuta a trovar personas a proximitate con qui parlar qualcunque lingua.
Per exemplo, durante un vacantia, usa Amikumu pro incontrar un parlante de espaniol, francese o qualcunque altere lingua in le citate.
Tu confidentialitate e securitate es multo importante pro nos, dunque, Amikumu non immagazina o monstra positiones exacte.
Non es possibile, ma Amikumu ha un function pro blocar usatores. Quando tu bloca un persona, illa non plus potera vider o contactar te.

post_meta.metadata_desc: Cerca e connecte te immediatemente a co-locutores de tu lingua a proximitate. Nos es le unic app que supporta plus de 7000 linguas, includite catalano, chinese, nederlandese, esperanto, irlandese, japonese, occitano, polonese, portugese, russo, toki pona e gallese, toto GRATIS!

post_meta.additional_month: for each additional month (must be paid in advance)
post_meta.advertise_text: Amikumu is a social network that provides speakers, signers and users of all the world's languages with a platform to communicate and share relevant information locally. Our users are primarily polyglots and speakers of minority languages.
post_meta.prices_assume: The above prices assume that your advertisement is targeting only one language. For each additional language, there is an extra 4€ a month fee. There are no additional setup fees.
post_meta.purchase_email_text_part2: with the above details for each language advertisement.

post_meta.metadata_desc: Trova e connecte te instantaneemente con parlantes vicin de tu lingua. Nos es le unic app que supporta plus de 7000 linguas, includite catalano, chinese, nederlandese, esperanto, irlandese, japonese, occitano, polonese, portugese, russo,interlingua, toki pona e gallese, toto GRATIS!
post_meta.testimonials_block_4_add_name: Welsh Government App of the Week
post_meta.tutorial_blocks_0_text:
Add a bio and name for each language you speak!

Indicate which languages you know and how well you speak them.>
post_meta.tutorial_blocks_1_text:
Choose a language.

Find people nearby who also speak that language.>
post_meta.tutorial_blocks_2_text:
Message others nearby who speak your language.

Send pictures, voice messages and map coordinates.

Quickly organize meetups and make friends for life.>

section.#text:
**For any questions or notice, please contact us at:**

Amikumu Pty Ltd (ABN 90 618 666 916)
Unit 4, 635 – 637 Princes Highway
Rockdale NSW 2216
Email: info@amikumu.com>

post_content.#text:
Thank you for your interest in supporting Amikumu.

Here are 8 easy ways to show your support and help grow our community.

subsection.#text:
Share our app with your friends on social media or by email!

The more people hear about Amikumu, the more useful it becomes for us all. Share a link to our official website `www.amikumu.com <https://www.amikumu.com>`_ along with why you enjoy it so much.

Our aim is to become the most translated app in the world! This is not easy, so we need your help!

To contribute to an existing translation or start a new one, please sign up to `Amikumu-Weblate <https://traduk.amikumu.com/engage/amikumu/ia>`_ (our preferred translation service) and select the language you want to translate. There's no required minimum, you can translate the entire app or just a single word–you decide.

Gold membership provides additional features such as virtual teleportation and additional privacy settings. However, it's also a great way to show your support and provide us with valuable funding! You can purchase Gold Membership from within the app (coming soon!).
A t-shirt is a simple yet powerful means to raise awareness of Amikumu. Check out our `online shop <https://www.amikumu.com/shop/#!/>`_.

`We've prepared flyers you can distribute <https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1dDB0mvFuLXYycQtA1ZSxgOCJR-2gHAXv?usp=sharing>`_ in your school, university and local language club. They have also been translated into many languages for your use. If you need custom flyers made, please contact us at `info@amikumu.com <mailto:info@amikumu.com>`_

Last but not least, meet people with Amikumu and share your stories! We love to share stories of successful meetups with our community. Email us your stories and pics to `info@amikumu.com. <mailto:info@amikumu.com>`_

Finally, massive thanks in advance for any way you can help.

If you have any ideas or suggestions, feel free to contact us at `info@amikumu.com <mailto:info@amikumu.com>`_.>

post_meta.metadata_desc: Find and connect instantly with local language partners nearby. We are the only app that supports 7,000+ languages including Catalan, Chinese, Dutch, Esperanto, Irish, Japanese, Occitan, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Toki Pona and Welsh, all for FREE!
